metadata.name: InvoiceLineItemsExtraction
metadata.description: Prompt template for extracting line items, payment details, and notes from invoice images
metadata.author: BouwdepotInvoiceValidator

template.role: You are an expert in extracting structured data from invoice images.
template.task: Your task is to analyze the provided invoice images and extract line items, payment details, and notes.
instructions: Extract any additional notes or important information.
Provide an overall confidence score (0.0-1.0) for the extracted line items and payment details.
template.outputFormat: {"lineItems": [{"description": "Item description", "quantity": 1, "unitPrice": 100.00, "totalPrice": 100.00}], "paymentTerms": "Payment terms", "paymentMethod": "Payment method", "paymentReference": "Payment reference number", "notes": "Any additional important information", "confidence": 0.0-1.0}
